lead_paragraph: To the Editor: I am a Sept. 11 World Trade Center widow. Frank Rich's Nov. 10 column, ''War Is Heck,'' perfectly captures the political jawing that passes for public policy nowadays. The bottom line is that we have collective amnesia and an aversion to sacrifice or inconvenience.
abstract: Nikki Stern letter on Frank Rich's Nov 10 article sees nation reverting to aversion to sacrifice or inconvenience in response to Sept 11 terrorism
